prevent.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to stop something from happening, or stop someone from doing something
prevent.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The rules are intended to prevent accidents.
His back injury may prevent him from playing in tomorrow’s game.
We were prevented from entering the site.
Wrap small ornaments in paper to prevent them being damaged.
prevent.translation[0].note_box[0].items: In everyday English, people usually say stop somebody/something (from) doing something rather than prevent somebody/something (from) doing something:
This barrier is to stop people from coming in without a ticket.
prevent.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to stop something happening, or someone doing something
prevent.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: government regulators working to prevent fraud
The region’s huge economic problems will prevent it from realizing its potential.
